definition: to quit/to give up (a bad habit)
to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: Alcoholics Anonymous twelve-step program originated to help people overcome their addiction;
sentences.chinese: 匿名十二步戒酒法旨在帮助人们戒除酒瘾。

sentences.english: Jane said she would take her husband back if he promised to give up bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 简说如果她丈夫保证戒除恶习，她就让他回来。

sentences.english: These chemicals must be detoxified and eliminated by the body.
sentences.chinese: 这些化学品必须戒除，并排出体外。

sentences.english: Schelling had spent years trying to kick his tobacco addiction.
sentences.chinese: 谢林试图戒除烟瘾已经有多年时间了。

sentences.english: Withdrawal symptoms include anxiety, irritability, shaking, and loss of appetite.
sentences.chinese: 戒除症状包括焦虑，易怒，打抖，和没胃口。

sentences.english: And he who pursues pleasure will not abstain from injustice, and this is plainly impiety .
sentences.chinese: 追求快乐的人将不会戒除不义，而这显然也是不敬。

sentences.english: From now, I will be a student who is preparing for national college entrance examination.
sentences.chinese: 从今起，我将戒除所有恶习，一心一意，考大学。

sentences.english: I am really holp myself and all people here and outside can terminate that erotic desire.
sentences.chinese: 我真的希望自己和所有的人都能戒除邪淫的欲望。

sentences.english: He has never conquered his addiction to smoking.
Members of Overeaters Anonymous(OA), for example, say they are "abstaining from overeating."
sentences.chinese: 例如，暴食匿名会的会员都说他们在“戒除暴食。”

sentences.english: If one wishes to be free from suffering, one must abstain from negative deeds.
sentences.chinese: 如果想要摆脱痛苦，那就必须戒除恶业。

sentences.english: This is a tough habit to get out of – but the below ste should help.
sentences.chinese: 这是个很难戒除的习惯，但以下的方式可能有帮助。

sentences.english: And he who pursues pleasure will not abstain from injustice, and this is plainly impiety.
sentences.chinese: 追求快乐的人将不会戒除不义，而这显然也是不敬。

sentences.english: You need to quit the women and whiskey and carrying on all night.
sentences.chinese: 你需要戒除拈花惹草和威士忌，还有彻夜狂欢。

definition: to give up drinking/to abstain from drinking
to resume smoking (after giving up)/to relapse into smoking or drug abuse
to kick a drug habit/to abstain from drugs
to cultivate/to raise/to form (a habit)/to acquire
to get into a habit/to become addicted
